item.title: Guns N' Roses ——《 This I Love 》
item.description: And no I don’t know why 我不明白是什麼原因 She wouldn’t say goodbye 她連再見也不說 Then it seems that I 然後 我似乎 I seen it in her eyes 在她的雙眸中找出答案 And though it may not be wise 雖然不是個明智的方法 I still have to try 我依然還是試試看 With all …
